products.name: Middlten Grey & Gold Wallclock
products.description: A modern timepiece featuring a matte grey base and elegant golden accents.Its minimal design blends seamlessly into contemporary or classic interiors.

products.name: Hexagonal Floating Shelves
products.description: Set of geometric wall-mounted shelves made from durable wood. Perfect for showcasing décor, plants, or books with a modern twist.

products.name: Hanging Diya Lamp
products.description: Traditional meets modern with this handcrafted diya-style hanging lamp. Adds a warm and spiritual glow to any room or entryway.

products.name: Artistic Metal Tripod Side Table
products.description: A stylish and sturdy accent table with a sleek metal tripod base. Ideal for living rooms, reading corners, or beside your sofa.

products.name: Double Layer Curtains
products.description: Elegant dual-layer curtains with sheer and opaque layers. Offers privacy, light control, and a sophisticated touch to your interiors.

products.name: Schefflera (Umbrella Plant) in Ceramic Planter
products.description: A lush green indoor plant known for its umbrella-like leaves. Potted in a premium ceramic planter to complement any indoor setting.

products.name: White Candle
products.description: Minimalist and calming, this unscented white candle adds a peaceful touch to your space. Great for meditation, décor, or gifting.

products.name: Modern Ceramic Globe Table Lamp
products.description: A spherical ceramic lamp with a soft matte finish and warm glow. Ideal for desks, nightstands, or cozy corners.

products.name: Artificial olive tree
products.description: Realistic and maintenance-free, this faux olive tree adds Mediterranean charm to your home without the upkeep.

products.name: Dreamscape Grey Framed Canvas
products.description: A dreamy blend of soft greys and abstract textures, framed in a sleek black border. Brings calm sophistication to any wall.

products.name: Mid-Century Textured Lounge Chair
products.description: Stylish and comfy chair with a bold wooden frame and textured upholstery — perfect for modern or retro interiors.

products.name: Double Layer-modern- Curtains
products.description: Two-layered modern curtains featuring flowing fabric for depth and elegance. Balances light and privacy effortlessly.
